title: BarQR
description:
- Scan QR and Barcodes
- Scan also Data Matrix, PDF-417, EAN-8, EAN-13, CODE-128, Codabar, ITF, Aztec and other formats
- Create QR codes for links, Wi-Fi, E-mail, contacts and more
- Export all codes to CSV
- Save scanned or created code to Photo or share

Why choose this app?
  - This app looks better than the competition and offers an intuitive interface, making the process of scanning and creating codes as simple as possible.
Always happy to receive your feedback to improve the app!
